title: make leona's stuns longer please
body:
everytime leona stuns me I go take a shower and after 20 minutes when i come back I see im still stunned,
please make the stuns last longer so i can dry myself up too

When The game was released:

TF's Ult was a basic ability
% dodge chance was a thing.
Ryze was also released.

Design decisions waren't quite as nuanced as they are now.

Also when the game was released:
Master Yi was the god of mobility.
Throw in the fact that Fear didn't always chase people away, and Fid's life drain + fear was more than enough durability for most of the game.

LoL has come a long way. Fid is just showing his age.
